name: Swiss Alps Adventure
description: Explore the breathtaking Swiss Alps with guided hikes, scenic train rides, and cozy mountain lodges.

name: Barcelona City Break
description: Enjoy a vibrant city break in Barcelona with visits to Sagrada Familia, Park GÃ¼ell, and local tapas tours.

name: Greek Island Hopping
description: Discover the beauty of the Greek islands with a 7-day cruise visiting Santorini, Mykonos, and Crete.

name: Paris Getaway
description: Experience the romance of Paris with a 5-day tour including visits to the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and Seine River cruise.

name: Italian Riviera Escape
description: Relax along the stunning Italian Riviera with visits to Cinque Terre, Portofino, and Genoa.

name: Scandinavian Fjords Cruise
description: Sail through the majestic fjords of Norway with stops in Bergen, Flam, and Geiranger.
